articles.title: Jeremy Swayman shares humorous response to regrettable goal in first Olympic start
articles.description:
Swayman allowed a center-ice goal to Denmark, but had to laugh it off in the aftermath of the United States' win.

The post Jeremy Swayman shares humorous response to regrettable goal in first Olympic start appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jeremy Swayman allowed a center-ice goal during his Olympic debut for Team USA.
Swayman humorously responded to the goal after the U.S. victory over Denmark.
His performance boosts local pride for Boston Bruins fans at the Olympics.

articles.title: NBA stars and legends weigh in on Jayson Tatum’s potential return this season
articles.description:
"I expect to see All-Star level play and the same Jayson Tatum we've seen before he was injured."

The post NBA stars and legends weigh in on Jayson Tatum’s potential return this season appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jayson Tatum is expected to return to All-Star level play this season.
NBA legends like Kevin Durant and Carmelo Anthony support Tatum's comeback.
Tatum's performance will significantly impact the Celtics' playoff chances in 2023.
